```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(geckor)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
pantos_history <- coin_history(coin_id = "busd", 
                                vs_currency = "usd", 
                                days = 90)
```
```{r}
polkadot_history <- coin_history(coin_id = "polkadot", 
                                vs_currency = "usd", 
                                days = "max")
```

```{r}
cosmos_history <- coin_history(coin_id = "cosmos", 
                                vs_currency = "usd", 
                                days=30)
```

```{r}
history <- coin_history(coin_id = c("harmony","cosmos","polkadot","pantos"), 
                                vs_currency = "usd", 
                                days = "max")

history<- 
  history %>% 
  mutate(market_cap= case_when(coin_id =="pantos" ~price* 486161689,
                               TRUE ~ market_cap))

write.csv(history,file="history.csv")
```

```{r}
history %>% 
  #filter(coin_id %in% c("cosmos","harmony")) %>% 
  ggplot()+
  geom_line(aes(x=timestamp,y=price,color=coin_id))
      
```
